sentences.sContent: The sports trauma not only damage their health, which contuse the enthusiasm of physical activity, but also effect normal study living, indeed the suffering of mentally and physical.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sports trauma not only damage their health, which contuse the enthusiasm of physical activity, but also effect normal study living, indeed the suffering of mentally and physical.
sentences.sCn: 学生在运动中受了伤，不仅损害健康，挫伤体育活动的积极性，而且影响正常的生活、学习，甚至给学生造成生理和心理上的痛苦。

trans.tranCn: 打伤, 挫伤, 撞伤
trans.tranOther: to injure (the body) without breaking the skin; bruise
